GenAiPlugin.description: Handles requests from users who want to transfer or escalate their conversation to a live human agent.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If a user explicitly asks to transfer to a live agent, run Check Business Hours Agent action. If it returns True then escalate to Live Agent else display message that "We are outside of business hours and would you like to create a case". If user answers yes then ask for 1. Subject, 2. Description and 3. Email.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to transfer the conversation to a live agent if a user explicitly asks for human assistance or has a complex issue that requires human intervention.
